item.text: “Now this is what you are to do for them to consecrate them so that they may minister as my priests. Take a young bull and two rams without blemish;

and<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="04682" class="">made without yeast</st>, and <st data-num="02471" class="">perforated cakes</st> <st data-num="04682" class="">without yeast</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>, and <st data-num="07550" class="">wafers</st> <st data-num="04682" class="">without yeast</st> <st data-num="04886" class="">spread</st><n id="2" /> with <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>—you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> them using<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05560" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="02406" class="">wheat flour</st>.
You are to put them in one basket and present them in the basket, along with the bull and the two rams.
“You are to present Aaron and his sons at the entrance of the tent of meeting. You are to wash them with water

and <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> and <st data-num="03847" class="">clothe</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> with the <st data-num="03801" class="">tunic</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04598" class="">robe</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, and the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>; you are to <st data-num="0640" class="">fasten</st> the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> on him by using the <st data-num="02805" class="">skillfully woven waistband</st>.<n id="2" />

You are to <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="04701" class="">turban</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="05145" class="">diadem</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04701" class="">turban</st>.

You are to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> and <st data-num="03332" class="">pour</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> and <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st> him.<n id="1" />
You are to <st data-num="07126" class="">present</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="03847" class="">clothe</st> them with <st data-num="03801" class="">tunics</st>
and wrap the sashes around Aaron and his sons and put headbands on them, and so the ministry of priesthood will belong to them by a perpetual ordinance. Thus you are to consecrate Aaron and his sons.
“You are to present the bull at the front of the tent of meeting, and Aaron and his sons are to put their hands on the head of the bull.
You are to kill the bull before the Lord at the entrance to the tent of meeting

and <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st><n id="1" /> with your <st data-num="0676" class="">finger</st>; <st data-num="03605">all</st> the rest of<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> you are to <st data-num="08210" class="">pour out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="03247" class="">base</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.

You are to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02459" class="">fat</st> that <st data-num="03680" class="">covers</st> the <st data-num="07130" class="">entrails</st>, and the <st data-num="03508" class="">lobe</st><n id="1" /> that is <st data-num="05921" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="03516" class="">liver</st>, and the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03629" class="">kidneys</st> and the <st data-num="02459" class="">fat</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> them, and <st data-num="06999" class="">burn</st> them<n id="2" /> on the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.
But the meat of the bull, its skin, and its dung you are to burn up outside the camp. It is the purification offering.
“You are to take one ram, and Aaron and his sons are to lay their hands on the ram’s head,

and you are to <st data-num="07819" class="">kill</st> the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> its <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> and <st data-num="02236" class="">splash</st> it <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.

Then you are to <st data-num="05408" class="">cut</st> the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> into <st data-num="05409" class="">pieces</st> and <st data-num="07364" class="">wash</st> the <st data-num="07130" class="">entrails</st> and its <st data-num="03767" class="">legs</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="05409" class="">pieces</st> and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st>
and burn the whole ram on the altar. It is a burnt offering to the Lord, a soothing aroma; it is an offering made by fire to the Lord.
“You are to take the second ram, and Aaron and his sons are to lay their hands on the ram’s head,

and you are to <st data-num="07819" class="">kill</st> the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of its <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08571" class="">tip</st> of the right <st data-num="0241" class="">ear</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08571" class="">tip</st> of the <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="0241" class="">ear</st> of his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">thumb</st> of their <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0931" class="">big toe</st> of their <st data-num="03233" class="">right</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>,<n id="1" /> and then <st data-num="02236" class="">splash</st> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.

You are to take some of the blood that is on the altar and some of the anointing oil and sprinkle it on Aaron, on his garments, on his sons, and on his sons’ garments with him, so that he may be holy, he and his garments along with his sons and his sons’ garments.

“You are to take from the ram the fat, the fat tail, the fat that covers the entrails, the lobe of the liver, the two kidneys and the fat that is on them, and the right thigh—for it is the ram for consecration—
and one round flat cake of bread, one perforated cake of oiled bread, and one wafer from the basket of bread made without yeast that is before the Lord.
You are to put all these in Aaron’s hands and in his sons’ hands, and you are to wave them as a wave offering before the Lord.
Then you are to take them from their hands and burn them on the altar for a burnt offering, for a soothing aroma before the Lord. It is an offering made by fire to the Lord.
You are to take the breast of the ram of Aaron’s consecration; you are to wave it as a wave offering before the Lord, and it is to be your share.

You are to <st data-num="06942" class="">sanctify</st> the <st data-num="02373" class="">breast</st> of the <st data-num="08573" class="">wave offering</st> and the <st data-num="07785" class="">thigh</st> of the <st data-num="08641" class="">contribution</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> were <st data-num="05130" class="">waved</st> and <st data-num="07311" class="">lifted up as a contribution</st> from the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> of <st data-num="04394" class="">consecration</st>, from <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> belongs to <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and to his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>.

It is to belong to Aaron and to his sons from the Israelites, by a perpetual ordinance, for it is a contribution. It is to be a contribution from the Israelites from their peace offerings, their contribution to the Lord.
“The holy garments that belong to Aaron are to belong to his sons after him, so that they may be anointed in them and consecrated in them.
The priest who succeeds him from his sons, when he first comes to the tent of meeting to minister in the Holy Place, is to wear them for seven days.
“You are to take the ram of the consecration and cook its meat in a holy place.

<st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> are to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">meat</st> of the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> and the <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> was in the <st data-num="05536" class="">basket</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

They are to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> those things by <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="03722" class="">atonement was made</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="04390 03027" class="">consecrate</st> and to <st data-num="06942">set</st> them <st data-num="06942" class="">apart</st>, but <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02114" class="">one else</st><n id="2" /> may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> them, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st>.
If any of the meat from the consecration offerings or any of the bread is left over until morning, then you are to burn up what is left over. It must not be eaten, because it is holy.
“Thus you are to do for Aaron and for his sons according to all that I have commanded you; you are to consecrate them for seven days.

Every <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">prepare</st> a <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03722" class="">atonement</st>.<n id="2" /> You are to <st data-num="02398" class="">purify</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> by<n id="4" /> <st data-num="03722" class="">making atonement</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> it, and you are to <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st> it to <st data-num="06942">set</st> it <st data-num="06942" class="">apart as holy</st>.
For seven days you are to make atonement for the altar and set it apart as holy. Then the altar will be most holy. Anything that touches the altar will be holy.
“Now this is what you are to prepare on the altar every day continually: two lambs a year old.

The <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lamb</st> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">prepare</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>, and the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lamb</st> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">prepare</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">around</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">sundown</st>.<n id="1" />

With the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">lamb</st> offer a <st data-num="06241" class="">tenth</st> of an ephah<n id="1" /> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with a <st data-num="07253" class="">fourth</st> of a <st data-num="01969" class="">hin</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> from <st data-num="03795" class="">pressed olives</st>, and a <st data-num="07253" class="">fourth</st> of a <st data-num="01969" class="">hin</st> of <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> as a <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offering</st>.

The second lamb you are to offer around sundown; you are to prepare for it the same meal offering as for the morning and the same drink offering, for a soothing aroma, an offering made by fire to the Lord.
“This will be a regular burnt offering throughout your generations at the entrance of the tent of meeting before the Lord, where I will meet with you to speak to you there.
There I will meet with the Israelites, and it will be set apart as holy by my glory.
“So I will set apart as holy the tent of meeting and the altar, and I will set apart as holy Aaron and his sons that they may minister as priests to me.

I will <st data-num="07931" class="">reside</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st>, and I will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> their <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>,
and they will know that I am the Lord their God, who brought them out from the land of Egypt, so that I may reside among them. I am the Lord their God.
